title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/reverse_puppy.html
notes:
Some updates for you.
 
I thought I might have gone over the top slightly with the Crufts but I think he fell for it. He might be suspecting something as he does not seem to be replying as fast as usual. I was laughing my head off when I got the last email.

messages.subject: PUPPIES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
messages.body:
HELLO,
my name is Steve Robinson i am 18years old,i am staying with my
grandmother 
who is 75years old and we both live in Eastham london,we has numerous 
puppies around us,Because we are pet lovers,The purpose of writing
this to you is that i will like you to adopt one or more of the puppies
because i will be resuming a college in germany next month and i would
not 
be able to take good care of them due to my resumption,Besides my
grandmothers is also old and i dont want those puppies to give herlots
of 
stress any longer.
If you are really interested the airline charges to send 1 of the
puppies 
will cost $250,$350 depending on where you are located.

so pls send me your full name and adress,how many puppies you are
interested 
in and the closest Airport to you.


This are the list of puppies we have:
English bull dogs
Yorkies
puddles
german sherpard

Hope to hear from you soon so that i will provide you all the pictures
and 
details of the puppies
Thanks
Steve Robinson
messages.raw:
Steve Robinson
From: Steve Robinson [mailto:steverobin01@yahoo.com]
Sent: 19 August 2007
Subject: PUPPIES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

HELLO,
my name is Steve Robinson i am 18years old,i am staying with my grandmother who is 75years old and we both live in Eastham london,we has numerous puppies around us,Because we are pet lovers,The purpose of writing this to you is that i will like you to adopt one or more of the puppies because i will be resuming a college in germany next month and i would not be able to take good care of them due to my resumption,Besides my grandmothers is also old and i dont want those puppies to give herlots of stress any longer.
If you are really interested the airline charges to send 1 of the puppies will cost $250,$350 depending on where you are located.

so pls send me your full name and adress,how many puppies you are interested in and the closest Airport to you.

This are the list of puppies we have:
English bull dogs
Yorkies
puddles
german sherpard

Hope to hear from you soon so that i will provide you all the pictures and details of the puppies
Thanks
Steve Robinson

messages.body:
Wow,

I have been looking for an English Bulldog Puppy. This email has come at
the perfect time. You must have known I was looking! I would be so
gratefull if you could help my dream come true. I would prefer a boy but
am not to fussed. I hope you receive this email and get back to me as
soon as possible as I do not want to waste anytime I could be spending
with my new companion.

Many Many Thanks in Advance.

Mr J.Somerville.
messages.raw:
Joseph Somerville
Wow,

I have been looking for an English Bulldog Puppy. This email has come at the perfect time. You must have known I was looking! I would be so gratefull if you could help my dream come true. I would prefer a boy but am not to fussed. I hope you receive this email and get back to me as soon as possible as I do not want to waste anytime I could be spending with my new companion.

Many Many Thanks in Advance.

Mr J.Somerville.

messages.body:
Hello joseph,
       Thanks for the interest in my lovely billy,He is so soft,cute and adorable.Billy is 8w eeks old and goes along with kids.You will definately love him.Attached is the pics of billy and i will like to know what you feel about him.Pls do reply with your full name,adress and the nearest airport to you.Hope to hear from you soon
Thanks
Steve
messages.raw:
Steve Robinson


From: Steve Robinson [mailto:steverobin01@yahoo.com]
Sent: 20 August 2007

Hello joseph,
Thanks for the interest in my lovely billy,He is so soft,cute and adorable.Billy is 8w eeks old and goes along with kids.You will definately love him.Attached is the pics of billy and i will like to know what you feel about him.Pls do reply with your full name,adress and the nearest airport to you.Hope to hear from you soon
Thanks
Steve

[Who knows where he got these pics]

messages.body:
Hi Steve,
 
Billy looks perfect. He is just what I am looking for. The nearest airport to me is LaGuardia Airport. I don't think this airport would count because it is for Internal flights (from the US to the US) only. The second nearest would be JFK. This I think would be much more suitable. I work for an English company so if necessary I have contacts in the UK who might be able to help. Here are my details you have requested.
 
Name: Joseph Somerville
Address: 222 W 77th St - New York, NY, United States 10024
Airport: JFK.
 
Please get back to me as soon as possible.
 
Regards,
J.Somerville
messages.raw:
Joseph Somerville

Billy looks perfect. He is just what I am looking for. The nearest airport to me is LaGuardia Airport. I don't think this airport would count because it is for Internal flights (from the US to the US) only. The second nearest would be JFK. This I think would be much more suitable. I work for an English company so if necessary I have contacts in the UK who might be able to help. Here are my details you have requested.

Name: Joseph Somerville
Address: 222 W 77th St - New York, NY, United States 10024
Airport: JFK.

Please get back to me as soon as possible.

Regards,
J.Somerville

Thanks

messages.body:
Oh excellent. I cant believe that I will be holding that cute little Billy in my own arms so soon. God must have been watching for this adorable little puppy to come my way when I have been searching. I love his name by the way.
 
Many Regards,
Joseph.

messages.subject: *******BRITISH AIRWAYS INFORMATION FOR BILLY *******
messages.body:
Hello mr joseph


ALL PAYMENT SHOULD BE MADE TO OUR BOOKING DEPARTMENT BELOW:

          WE RECIEVE OUR PAYMENT THROUGH WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER ON INTERNATIONAL BASIS. SO REPLY US WITH ALL THE NECESSARY INFORMATIONS
 OF THE WESTERN UNION WHEN YOU MAKE THE PAYMENT TO THE ABOVE INFORMATIONS.
NAME::::::::::::::OLUWASEUN BAMIGBOSE,

  ADDRESS::::::::23 0LAVES ROAD EASTHAM LONDON,

  COUNTRY::::::::::::::ENGLAND,

  CITY:::::::::::::::LONDOND,UNITEDKIGDOM

  TOTAL AMOUNT REQUIED:$450

  

     THANKS ONCE AGAIN FOR USING OUR SERVICE.
NOTICE..
         
Hello,(Mr Joseph Somerville) we are told to contact u
by MR STEVE ROBIN,  Who as schedule the delivery of billy(ENGLISH BULL PUPPY)

  

  to you by Monday(   20/8/2007).Mr Steve brought B
illy to our premises    3:00 pm this afternoon and would be delivered to you by    22-08-2007

  

  we will proceed with the delivery as soon as the payment has been done.

  

  NOTE:

       Payment is required before friday for feeding and to get him ready for delivery



  (SKYE TRAVELS IN CONJUTION WITH BRITISH AIRWAYS)


                     Mr.R.A.Kingsley
messages.raw:
Mr. R. A. Kingsley

[The airways bill.
ha ha]

Mr.R.A.Kingsley

[There were also some animated gifs of swooping airplanes, very impressive, unfortunately Scamorama lack the skill to include them here. Picture the Berlin Airlift.]

[OLUWASEUN BAMIGBOSE is either (a nom de scam of ) the Lad himself, or the Lad's crony who is to pick up the money. But you knew that.]

messages.body:
Hi Steve,
 
I don't think BA have received my payment the money is still in my Bank Account. I need to pay it again I think. Can you check with them on my behalf. I hate to think Billy is waiting in London still. He should be on his way by now. Please let me know what I need to do next.
 
P.S. Can you tell me more about Billy. What is his favourite food?. Does he need a lot of grooming? How often do you walk him? And anything else I may need to know?
 
Thank you so much for being so helpful and kind with only other people interests in your heart.
J.
messages.raw:
Joseph Somerville
Hi Steve,

I don't think BA have received my payment the money is still in my Bank Account. I need to pay it again I think. Can you check with them on my behalf. I hate to think Billy is waiting in London still. He should be on his way by now. Please let me know what I need to do next.

P.S. Can you tell me more about Billy. What is his favourite food?. Does he need a lot of grooming? How often do you walk him? And anything else I may need to know?

Thank you so much for being so helpful and kind with only other people interests in your heart.
J.

["Mr. Kingsley's" invoice again, complete with swooping airplanes. This time think Wayne's World.]

messages.body:
Hello Steve,
 
I am very unhappy with British Airways Service. I have tried to make the payments but am having problems. Please help me make the payment. Do I phone Western Union or British Airways? I have the money waiting for you but seem unable to make the payment. Please advise me where you want me to pay the money
 
I really need to get Billy over to the US as soon as possible as I need to start his training regime for Crufts. It is a long task to train a Bull Dog to play the violin and need as much time as possible. I also need to know whether he will be suitable. If you are able to visit Billy I will need to know something as this will help me organize training in advance. I need you to lift up his tail and tell me what shade of blue his underlying excretion gland is. If it is a light blue colour then he will be perfect. If it is Dark Blue then sadly I shall not be able to teach him the violin, so will have to fall back on the Bass guitar.
 
Many thanks
Joseph.
 
P.S. Please get back to me as soon as possible as I want to get the payment to you for Billy.
messages.raw:
Joseph Somerville
Hello Steve,

I am very unhappy with British Airways Service. I have tried to make the payments but am having problems. Please help me make the payment. Do I phone Western Union or British Airways? I have the money waiting for you but seem unable to make the payment. Please advise me where you want me to pay the money

I really need to get Billy over to the US as soon as possible as I need to start his training regime for Crufts. It is a long task to train a Bull Dog to play the violin and need as much time as possible. I also need to know whether he will be suitable. If you are able to visit Billy I will need to know something as this will help me organize training in advance. I need you to lift up his tail and tell me what shade of blue his underlying excretion gland is. If it is a light blue colour then he will be perfect. If it is Dark Blue then sadly I shall not be able to teach him the violin, so will have to fall back on the Bass guitar.

Many thanks
Joseph.

P.S. Please get back to me as soon as possible as I want to get the payment to you for Billy.

[Crufts is an international dog show and competition]

messages.body:
Hello joseph
                    Thanks for the information,i went to the Airlines office early today and Billy was doing fine,i have checked Billys tail and is underlying excretion gland is Light blue,so billy would be ready to learn how to play the violin,here is a brief explaination on how to make the payment via western union money transfer:
just walk to any Western union outlet near you and send the payment directly to the payment  section information of  B.A :
Receivers Name:Oluwaseun Bamigbose
Location:London,UnitedKingdom
After you have made the payment a receipt would be issued out to you,So you would send me the following infomation which would be written on the receipt,in other for me to forward it to the Airline immediately:
1)MTCN 10 digit number
2)Senders Name
3)Secret question and answer
4)total amount sent.

Below are some Western union Outlet near you:

BRG CHECK CASHING
470 AMSTERDAM AVE  
NEW YORK, NY 10024
Tel: (212) 787-7572

RITE AID #4885
210-20 AMSTERDAM AVE   BETWEEN 69TH & 70TH STREET
MANHATTAN, NY 10023
Tel: (212) 787-2903...



I will be looking forward to hear from you.
Regards
Steve
